overview: A woman answers the phone at night. She learns something terrible has happened to her boyfriend David in Phuket. Her world collapses.  Stilte na de storm visualises that single brief moment between the nocturnal phone call and the confirmation of the dreaded message. In a stream of consciousness, emotions, memories and reality sweep through her like a storm, before she realises she has lost David. Only silence remains.
title: Stilte na de storm
